title: Fps does not leave 6 ....
body:
Anyone else with low fps problem? I did the clean installation of the w10 yesterday and it was working "normal", it gave lag in some tf, but nothing much.
But, so I wanted to install Adobe Air, because of that, and now mine is in 16 ...
I had updated the drivers, continued the same thing, I ended up reversing the driver because my pc got too slow. Oh, and when I installed the w10
Lol worked fine, nothing updated, just with the updated directx! Is it a customer bug? In the r3d logs have enough errors ... And it's not overheating,
And much less video card or other driver, and my pc has support for lol
*I copied and pasted from my cousin *

replies.body: You may want to have your cousin make their own post so we can get more information from them and work to resolve this together. ^.^
You can help us, we are using the same PC ...

Just saw your other reply to me mentioning you've already disabled the Game DVR feature. Since you're still having issues, there may be some problems with your system drivers or windows power settings. Our [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) covers a lot of the configurations that may cause this issue, so I recommend giving those steps a go.

Let me know if this helped.

I've done everything in the "Fps Guide". 
Will my lol get back to normal in 6.23 update? {{item:3151}}

It's likely this is a more complicated issue we'll need system logs for. I recommend running those logs using [our HRT](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). one of our techs will be happy to assist you from here out.
